constantValues: Work item of a campaign activity, such as a list or sales literature.
Unique identifier of the campaign activity item.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Activity and CampaignActivity' adds the 'campaignActivityId' attribute below to the 'CampaignActivityItem' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the campaign activity for the item.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'MarketingList' adds the 'itemId' attribute below to the 'CampaignActivityItem' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.name: itemObjectTypeCode_display

constantValues: Identification of the type of the campaign activity item.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User and Team' adds the 'ownerId' attribute below to the 'CampaignActivityItem' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user or team who owns the campaign activity item.
